channel.title: Stuck in a hole [Fixed]
channel.description:
![](upload://bKrLeiq4CbBkYkilJUBFRFRhHhY.jpeg)
I fell into the little hole my flashlight is pointing at and was unable to jump out again. I'm not sure why; I just couldn't get very much height.
] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c1a1a at: 1321 x, 957 y, -447 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "FredMSloniker" UNKNOWN 00:52 33 0 active loopback ShaderAPIDX8::CreateD3DTexture: D3DERR_INVALIDCALL ShaderAPIDX8::CreateD3DTexture: D3DERR_INVALIDCALL ] getpos setpos 1321.750366 957.327393 -447.968750;setang 4.365857 24.849148 0.000000

item.title: Stuck in a hole [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Rabbiddog
item.description:
Did you try left ctrl+space. That is the key combo to ‘climb’. This is the same if you want to ‘climb’ on top of a crate. You can’t actually jump (space) up on it, however the key combo will let you climb on top of it.

Read full topic
